title: Beautiful apt with amenities near L/G Train!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


NO FEE!!
BEAUTIFUL - LUXURY 1 BEDROOM

AMAZING LOCATION, Near the L.G.J.M Trains.
Located Just 1 Block over from Grand St, where you can find lots of Great Restaurants, Bars, Supermarkets, Coffee shops and much more.

Laundry room
Lounge, game room
GYM
Roof Deck
Beautiful Shared Courtyard
Central A/C and Heat
Dishwasher
S/S appliances, Wood floors
Windows, Closets
